description: Test suite for the 'Agent' class and associated tools in the 'agno' project, focusing on tool invocation, streaming, asynchronous calls, and multiple tool interactions within the 'fireworks' model context.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content verification.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool calls within streamed chunks.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response content verification.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool invocation detection.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response for different stock symbols.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single query.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a tool with multiple URLs as input.
